description: Post-correctness follow-up: runtime health report, wake/cancel behavior, and project-root file discovery.

experiments.title: Runtime health report
experiments.prompt: Please generate a concise runtime health report for this running go-agents service. Include: (1) task counts by status and task type, (2) the top 3 oldest running tasks with id/type/age_seconds, and (3) whether any exec tasks are currently queued. Use live runtime data, not assumptions.

experiments.title: Wake and stale task cancellation
experiments.prompt: Please start one deliberately long-running exec task (for example a sleep), wait for task_health wake behavior to detect it as stale, and then cancel it. Return the task id and final task status from runtime state.

experiments.title: Project-root largest Go files
experiments.prompt: Please inspect the local project at /app/go-agents and list the five largest Go source files by line count, with exact file paths and counts.
